thread.title: 90 Day Fiance: Julia Trubkina Went Broke After Brandon Split & Cheating Scandal?
thread.title_full: 90 Day Fiance: Julia Trubkina Went Broke After Brandon Split & Cheating Scandal?

author: Sarah Kidwai
title: 90 Day Fiance: Julia Trubkina Went Broke After Brandon Split & Cheating Scandal?
text:
90 Day Fiance star Julia Trubkina has just given her fans a hint about her money problems. She seems to struggle with money amid breakup rumors with her husband, Brandon Gibbs. The TLC couple’s marriage has been on the verge of falling apart. Hence, they joined The Last Season 2 to work on their differences and save their marriage. Julia has kept many secrets from her husband. She has hidden her fertility issues from her partner, which led to huge issues in their marriage.
Brandon has been ready to do everything to make his marriage work. He also wanted to spice up their bedroom life. However, Julia admitted to cheating on him with her ex-boyfriend. Fans now wonder if Julia has been dealing with money issues. What happened to her? Why do fans think she is struggling with finances? Has Brandon left her?
JULIA HOUSE HUNTING [SOURCE: @juliatrubkina1993] 90 Day Fiance: Julia Has Been Searching For A New Home In America! 90 Day Fiance star Julia Trubkina has confused her followers about her current dynamics with her husband, Brandon Gibbs. She has been posting many crying selfies and emotional stories on Instagram lately. The TLC star shocked everyone when the couple posted pictures again on social media. Hence, fans were happy that Julia and Brandon had worked on their issues. Recently, the former turned heads again when she uploaded a new update on her Instagram.
She posted a selfie while sitting in the car’s driving seat. The reality TV star asked her followers to wish her luck as she was looking at houses. Trubkina has not revealed the reason behind her house hunting. She also did not share whether her husband was with her during the process. However, fans predicted that Brandon wasn’t with his wife. Is Julia struggling with money after moving to a new house?
90 Day Fiance: Julia Shares Her Financial Troubles With Fans! 90 Day Fiance star Julia Trubkina has not been sharing any updates with her husband, Brandon Gibbs, on social media. She mostly talks about her dogs and her co-stars in her stories. The TLC star has introduced her two furbabies on Instagram. Julia discussed her fertility issues in her post and expressed how much she loves being a dog mom.
JULIA FINANCES [SOURCE: @juliatrubkina1993] Recently, Julia uploaded a story to share the receipt from the vet. She took her two dogs for a checkup. The reality TV star revealed that she had paid $1222.64 for the check-up. Julia also shared a picture of her furbabies sitting in her car’s backseat. She wrote, “We just spent our mom’s salary.” Hence, the reality TV star expressed her desire to collaborate with a vet clinic.
Trubkina used a prayer emoji to request her followers to suggest a collaboration. Fans were quick to guess that she had been struggling with money. They also didn’t understand why Brandon didn’t help his wife foot the bill. Moreover, the Russian native calls herself her dog mom and calls them HER babies . Brandon works as a pest control technician.
So it won’t be an issue for him to foot the bill. Still, Julia has to get help from her followers to find a new income source. Do you think Julia has moved out of Brandon’s home? Do share your thoughts in the comments below. Keep coming back to TV Season & Spoilers for more updates on Julia and Brandon’s new dynamics.
